document.full_text: world stocks rose from a two-month low on thursday while the euro hit a one-week peak versus the dollar, aided by higher commodities and a report on china's possible interest in "bailout" bonds for portugal.
document.title: world stocks rise from two-month low; euro firmer
lines_and_colors: world stocks rose from a two-month low on thursday while the euro hit a one-week peak versus the dollar, aided by higher commodities and a report on china's possible interest in "bailout" bonds for portugal.
